resources.string:
Satisfied with our services?
BizLink team is happy to hear from you.
Website: http://bizlink.site40.net
Email: david.maraba@gmail.com
Phone: +25472700120

BizLink is mobile applications that simplifies the sales and marketing workload of companies by making interested app users their Agents.
It works in a link-reward scheme.
This is whereby the agents earn points for every successfull link of a client to a product or business.
These points are redeemable for the various awards set up by the listed businesses.
For more visit http://www.bizlink.site40.net

The steps for using the app are:
  1. Register (If new) and select the categories of products/deals you would like to be an agent to.
  2. Check on the deals that you have an idea of an interested party
  3. Send the deal to the individual.
  5. Upon the client taking up the product your points will be updated
  6. These points can be redeemed from the listing company(details provided)
. Its that simple! For more check: http://www.bizlink.site40.net
